Processing and analyzing of data from the video camera

entries.institution: University of Oslo - Faculty of Clinical Medicine
details: Doctoral education at the Institute of Clinical Medicine at the University of Oslo
Courses relevant to neurobiology, advanced statistics, and other academic and non-academic skills
Master's program in Biomedicine at the Faculty of Medicine
Focus on molecular biology and neuroscience
Major in the pre-medical science track, minor in philosophy
Liberal Arts & Science program
Honors College

technical_skills.title: Technical Skills
description: Daily use of Python, R, SQL (various dialects), bash, AWS, Snowflake, Git, and common packages and module. Experience also with MATLAB, LaTeX, HTML/CSS. Have also previously worked with Google Cloud and SLURM.

In addition, I'm familiar with common data science and data engineering frameworks including but not limited to Shiny, Flask, Streamlit, MLFlow, Jenkins, Docker, Airflow, TensorFlow, LangChain, dbt, and various other common tools.

entries.title: Sparbanken Skåne Master Prize
details: Awarded to the best master theses in the field of neuroscience

clinical_experience.title: Clinical Experience
description: Between my BSc and my MSc I worked for a year in various positions at the University Medical Centre Utrecht and the Gelre Hospital in Apeldoorn to obtain additional practical clinical and research experience.
